EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity Closed as Won
EmailTemplate.subject: IGB Video Gaming Application : Close Opportunity As Won
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The IGB Video Gaming Application : {!LicenseApplication__c.Name}, has data entered for the following fields:
FingerPrinting Complete: {!LicenseApplication__c.Fingerprinting_Complete__c},
Submitted Date: {!LicenseApplication__c.Submitted_Date__c},
Fee Paid Date: {!LicenseApplication__c.Fee_Paid_Date__c}
The field, Commissioned As, has also been completed on the related Opportunity record.
Please review the related Opportunity of this Application record to change its status to "Close as Won".
Link to Applicaiton Record: {!LicenseApplication__c.Link}
